# Contributing to Serverless RAG Chatbot

Thank you for your interest in contributing! This document provides guidelines and instructions for contributing.

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/yourusername/serverless-rag-chatbot.git`
3. Create a branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name`
4. Make your changes
5. Test your changes: `npm run lint && npm run build`
6. Commit: `git commit -m "Add your feature"`
7. Push: `git push origin feature/your-feature-name`
8. Open a Pull Request

## Development Guidelines

### Code Style

- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Use ESLint (run `npm run lint` before committing)
- Write clear, self-documenting code
- Add comments for complex logic

### Testing

- Ensure `npm run lint` passes
- Ensure `npm run build` succeeds
- Test locally with `npm run dev`

### Commit Messages

Use clear, descriptive commit messages:
- `feat: add semantic cache expiration`
- `fix: resolve PDF parsing edge case`
- `docs: update README with deployment steps`

## Areas for Contribution

- Performance optimizations
- Additional document format support (beyond PDF)
- UI/UX improvements
- Documentation improvements
- Bug fixes
- Feature requests

## Questions?

Open an issue for discussion or questions!
